class_notes: This course offers guidance, growth-oriented tasks, and moments for reflection to undergraduate students from any discipline engaging in research opportunities outside of Emory over the summer. It satisfies the Experience and Application General Education Requirement, available for either 0 or 1 credit hours.
course_description: The purpose of the course is to provide support, developmental assignments and reflection opportunity for undergraduate students who complete undergraduate research experiences outside of Emory during the summer.
sections: Class Nbr: 2006, Section #: 1, Type: IND, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Rolle, Status: Open
